content: you will love this mummy trick or treat crochet pattern the perfect halloween crochet mummy bag easy and quick to make make one for your favorite trick or treater or make one to hold candy in your home or office pattern is written in english using standard american terms > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern bag is approx 10 tall including the handle 5 5 tall excluding the handle the diameter of the bag is approx 6 5 materials needed - worsted weight yarn approx 3 ounces of white and 4 ounces of gray - crochet hook size j - 15 mm safety eyes - tapestry needle pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-halloween-bag/
